Package ie.gmit.dip

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
ie.gmit.dip.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class Menu
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
Menu display a command line interface to the user allowing the user to input text files and compare there similarity using the cosine similarity calculator.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    boolean keepRunning  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Menu()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void calculateCosineSimilarity()
    Calculates the cosine similarity of two HashMaps, prints the result to the console along with the similarity as a percentage.
    void enterQueryFile()
    Allows the user to enter a Query file which is sent to the File Handler to be converted to a HashMap.
    void enterQueryUrl()
    Allows the user to enter a Query URL which is sent to the File Handler to be converted to a HashMap.
    void enterSubjectFile()
    Allows the user to enter a Subject file which is sent to the File Handler to be converted to a HashMap.
    void enterSubjectUrl()
    Allows the user to enter a Subject URL which is sent to the File Handler to be converted to a HashMap.
    void run()
    Shows a command Menu allowing the user to make a selection

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Shows a command Menu allowing the user to make a selection
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable
      Parameters:
      keepRunning - Allows the Menu to stay open.
      choice - Allow the user to make a selection.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - If string entered instead of int.
      java.util.InputMismatchException - If token retrieved does not match the pattern for the expected type.

    • enterQueryFile

      public void enterQueryFile()
      Allows the user to enter a Query file which is sent to the File Handler to be converted to a HashMap.
      Parameters:
      s - New scanner initialized.
      query - Allows the user to enter the file name.
      queryMap - Saves the returned HashMap.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - If string entered instead of int.
      java.util.InputMismatchException - If token retrieved does not match the pattern for the expected type.

    • enterSubjectFile

      public void enterSubjectFile()
      Allows the user to enter a Subject file which is sent to the File Handler to be converted to a HashMap.
      Parameters:
      s - New scanner initialized.
      subject - Allows the user to enter the file name.
      subjectMap - Saves the returned HashMap.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NumberFormatException - If string entered instead of int.
      java.util.InputMismatchException - If token retrieved does not match the pattern for the expected type.

    • enterQueryUrl

      public void enterQueryUrl()
      Allows the user to enter a Query URL which is sent to the File Handler to be converted to a HashMap.
      Parameters:
      s - New scanner initialized.
      query - Allows the user to enter the URL address.
      subjectMap - Saves the returned HashMap.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if your input format is invalid.
      java.util.InputMismatchException - If token retrieved does not match the pattern for the expected type.

    • enterSubjectUrl

      public void enterSubjectUrl()
      Allows the user to enter a Subject URL which is sent to the File Handler to be converted to a HashMap.
      Parameters:
      s - New scanner initialized.
      subject - Allows the user to enter the URL address.
      subjectMap - Saves the returned HashMap.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if your input format is invalid
      java.util.InputMismatchException - If token retrieved does not match the pattern for the expected type.

    • calculateCosineSimilarity

      public void calculateCosineSimilarity()
      Calculates the cosine similarity of two HashMaps, prints the result to the console along with the similarity as a percentage.
      Parameters:
      percent - Used to display cosine similarity as a percentage.
